extended_tooltips.text: Revitalize: Heals an ally for <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinHeal_HealPrimary.amount"/> health. Nearby friendly units are healed for <d ref="duckiesClonePaladin_HealSecondary.amount"/> health.

Hammer Time: Spins around, gaining <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_HostBuff.modifiers[1].amount"/> armor and dealing <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_impactDamage.amount/duckiesClonePaladinSpin_HostBuff.periodic_duration" style="Red"/> damage per second to nearby enemies. Damaged enemies will have their attack speed briefly reduced by <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_ImpactSlowBuff.modifiers[0].amount*(-1)"/>%. Lasts <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_HostBuff.duration"/> seconds.

Heavy Leap: Leaps to target location, dealing <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinLeap_ImpactDamageRadius.amount" style="Red"/> damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinLeap_ImpactStun.duration"/> seconds.

Fortify: Protects an allied hero with a shield which absorbs up to <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinShield_ResponseDamage.damage_shield_settings.shields_max"/> damage and makes them resilient to stuns. Lasts <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinShields_Buff.duration"/> seconds.
Revive: Channels for <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinRevive_StartPersistent.effect_expire_delay"/> seconds on an dead hero's grave and then revives all friendly heroes in the target area.
